Chapter 3 Data 3.1 Data Import 3.2 Data Quality

Chapter 3 Data 3.1 Data Import 10 parameters of the UL data available from the DWQ from the years 2017, 2018, and 2019 are analyzed in this report. The data, that include data from 10 stations, were downloaded in October of 2020. The available data are from April to November. These data were divided by station and filtered by year and month. The data from the same month was averaged. The table 3.2 shows the processed data for the station 4917500. Due to the fact that the station 4917450 is the only one that does not have missing values, all the analysis of this project is performed with this specific data set. To be able to compare the monthly average per year, we kept only the months from May to September (table 3.1).
